(:action board ; Board an entity and update state
  :parameters (?agent - entity ?platform - location ?vehicle - vehicle)
  :precondition (and (at ?agent ?platform) (at ?vehicle ?platform) (solid_platform ?platform) (not (in ?agent ?vehicle)))
  :effect (and (in ?agent ?vehicle) (not (at ?agent ?platform))

(:action hold
    :parameters (?p - passenger ?b - boat ?r - rail ?d - dock ?other_passenger - passenger)
    :precondition (and 
        (at ?p ?d) 
        (in ?p ?b) 
        (has_rails ?b) 
        (boarding ?other_passenger ?b)
        (not (holding ?p ?r))
    )
    :effect (and 
        (holding ?p ?r) 
        (steady ?b) 
        (not (rocking ?b))
